biotools.summary: The Chinese Glioma Genome Atlas (CGGA) is a user-friendly web application for data storage and analysis to explore brain tumors datasets. This database includes the whole-exome sequencing, DNA methylation, mRNA sequencing, mRNA microarray and microRNA microarray and matched clinical data. The analyse tool allows users to browse DNA mutation profile, mRNA/microRNA expression profile and methylation profile, and to do correlation and survival analysis in specific glioma subtype.
